scripts.pack: [ ! -d dist ] && mkdir dist || /bin/echo -n; mv public userguide && tar czpf dist/docs-userguide.tgz userguide && mv userguide public && ls -l dist/docs-userguide.tgz
scripts.deploy-to-preview: npm run cibuild && rsync -a --delete public/ web@tc:/cs/local/guide/userguide
scripts.deploy-to-s3: /bin/echo -n 'THIS IS PROD: Are you sure? ' && read ans && [ "$ans" = y ] &&  aws --quiet s3 sync public/ s3://docs.codestream.com/userguide/ --delete && npm run cfdirty
